typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Year = trim(right(title, 6),'()'),
		title = left(title,length(title)-6)) ~> Year
Year aggregate(groupBy(Year),
	Count = count(Year)) ~> Cunt
Year, Cunt join(Year@Year == Cunt@Year,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['moviesout.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
